Articles.Content:
Hi, I've downloaded DYJ Gau-19 mod, and I tried to put some sound on it by adding this to the part .cfg:

// --- Sound FX definition ---

gatling-gun.wav = DYJMachinegun

and by putting the .wav in a file right next to the part .cfg

but when I fire, nothing happens, so, could someone that successfully put some sound tell me how he made?

Thanks!
